spec.title: Read and analyze the README.md file

meta.directive: Use read_file tool to read README.md, then use analyze_code tool to get code statistics. Return both results.

spec.title: List all TypeScript files in packages/coc/src

meta.directive: Use list_files tool to list the packages/coc/src directory. Count how many .ts files exist.

spec.title: Create a new AI role called 'code-reviewer'

meta.directive: Use create_role tool to create a new role named 'code-reviewer' with category 'engineering', basePrompt 'You review code for bugs and improvements', needsCoding true, needsTools true, temperature 0.3.

spec.title: Search for all uses of 'registerTool' in the codebase

meta.directive: Use search_files tool to find all occurrences of 'registerTool' pattern in packages/coc/src directory.

spec.title: Execute terminal command to check Git status

meta.directive: Use terminal_execute tool to run 'git status --short' command and return the output.

spec.title: Create a new role and then list all roles

meta.directive: First use create_role to create a role named 'data-analyst' with category 'analytics', basePrompt 'You analyze data and create insights', needsJson true. Then use list_roles to list all created roles.

spec.title: Check if a file exists and read it if it does

meta.directive: Use file_exists to check if packages/coc/package.json exists. If it exists, use read_json to read and parse it.
Analyze the project structure and plan a strategy for managing dependencies and tool integration.
Evaluate the quality of the tool execution from previous tasks. Score them on accuracy and completeness.
Combine multiple tools: list_files on packages/coc/src, analyze_code on packages/coc/src/coc.ts, search_files for 'ModelBandit', then write_json to save all results to out/project-analysis.json.

spec.title: Create comprehensive test report as JSON

meta.directive: Use terminal_execute to run 'pnpm list --depth=0 --json', then write_json to save the output to out/test-report.json with proper formatting.
Use get_role tool with name 'code-reviewer' to retrieve the role details we created earlier. Then list all roles with list_roles.
